TopicTitle: Whatever became of Squad's gifted rover?

Articles.Content:
This is a bit of a throwback for those who have been here long enough to remember it, but back in 2013 Squad got a gift from Robots Everywhere, that being a rover. From the video (shown below), it appears to be able to use a mobile phone camera as it's POV and I would assume it was remote controlled (but this is off the main question).

The question being, whatever became of that rover? In the video it says stayed tuned for more information about it, but it's been 3 (going on close to 4) years since then, and the Kerbal Space Program YouTube channel has remained silent on the topic (despite releasing update videos). So where is it? Did they put it up on a shelf and forget about it? Or did they pass it onto someone else?

A lot has happened since 2013. The game has exploded in shape and appearance, but more importantly, Squad members have come and gone and (this is complete speculation with no evidence between it whatsoever) is it possible that they could have passed it onto one of the few who left as a parting gift?

So just simply curious what ever happened to that little thing.

Video in question-

Good question.

@UomoCapra, do you know they're still there?

it gained sentience and is secretly @RoverDude!

 

 

Or it was fitted with a robotic arm and used to steal office lunches or something.  So it would be gone.
It was being a jerk, so they kicked it to the curb.  Good riddance, I say.
